item.title: tmux basics
item.author: Author
item.description: ###tmux server -> sessions -> windows -> panes Session Management 1 2 3 4 5 6 tmux list-sessions tmux new-session -s session-name tmux detach (prefix + d) tmux a -t : x attach seccion named x tmux kill-session -t session-name tmux kill-server Windows 1 2 3 4 tmux new-window (prefix + c) create window tmux select-window -t [0-9] (prefix + [0-9]) tmux rename-window (prefix + ,) prefix+?
